name: parity-project
description: Parity - Relationship Communication App - Full Stack

scripts.start: npm run start:backend && npm run start:frontend
scripts.stop: docker-compose -f docker-compose.backend.yml down && docker-compose -f docker-compose.frontend.yml down
scripts.dev: npm run start:backend & npm run start:frontend
scripts.clean: docker-compose -f docker-compose.backend.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.frontend.yml down -v
